column3:
> Now the implementation is invalid 

This is clearly dead code and probably it should go. Though it's only in the tests and I can see how this debugging can be useful if you're troubleshooting a test failure. So please add some details on how it is invalid/incompatible now.

utACK.

It just does not compile:

```make
  CXX      wallet/test/test_test_bitcoin-accounting_tests.o
test/key_tests.cpp: In function ‘void dumpKeyInfo(uint256)’:
test/key_tests.cpp:35:9: error: ‘class CKey’ has no member named ‘resize’; did you mean ‘size’?
     key.resize(32);
         ^~~~~~
test/key_tests.cpp:36:13: error: ‘secret’ was not declared in this scope
     mem

Yes, the function occurs compiling error if KEY_TESTS_DUMPINFO is defined.\nThe keywords "dumpKeyInfo" and "KEY_TESTS_DUMPINFO" are not found anywhere in the repository except for the key_tests.cpp, so the section is completely dead I judged.
This is part-duplicate of #9987, please close this PR.\n
